translations.Integration of Moodle learning managemen: Integratzione de su sistema de gestione de s'imparu Moodle
translations.Moodle integration provides a dashboard:
S'integratzione Moodle frunit unu trastu de su pannellu de controllu chi mustrat informatziones subra is cursos retzentes tuos e is pròssimos eventos.
Ti permitit puru de chircare contenutos in Moodle.
translations.Failed to save Moodle admin options: No at fatu a sarvare is sèberos amministrativos de Moodle
translations.Disable search for all users: Disativa sa chirca pro totu is utentes
translations.Failed to save Moodle options: No at fatu a sarvare is sèberos de Moodle
translations.Successfully connected to Moodle!: Connètidu a Moodle in manera curreta!
translations.Failed to authenticate to Moodle: No at fatu a s'autenticare in Moodle
translations.Your password is not stored. It is just: Sa crae tua no est istada sarvada. S'impreat una borta isceti pro otènnere unu token chi at a serbire pro interagire cun su contu Nextcloud tuo.
translations.Enable searching for courses: Ativa sa chirca de is cursos
translations.Enable searching for course modules: Ativa sa chirca de is mòdulos de is cursos
translations.Enable searching for upcoming events: Ativa sa chirca de is eventos imbenientes
translations.Warning, everything you type in the sear: Avisu: totu su chi iscries in s'istanca de chirca s'at a imbiare a s'istàntzia Moodle tua.
translations.Error connecting to Moodle: Errore in sa connessione a Moodle
translations.Failed to get Moodle notifications: No at fatu a retzire is notìficas de Moodle
